begin_end_statements.sql: SELECT COUNT (*) INTO CNTR FROM CFG_V_COMPANY_ADDRESSES WHERE COMPANY_CD = NVL(:NEW.COMPANY_CD, :OLD.COMPANY_CD) AND ADDRESS_TYPE_CD = NVL(:NEW.ADDRESS_TYPE_CD, :OLD.ADDRESS_TYPE_CD);

then_statements.sql: SELECT COMPANY_TYPE_CD INTO V_COMPANY_TYPE_CD FROM CFG_V_COMPANIES WHERE COMPANY_CD = NVL ( :NEW.COMPANY_CD, :OLD.COMPANY_CD);
SELECT COUNT(*) INTO CNTR FROM CFG_V_COMPANIES WHERE COMPANY_CD = :NEW.COMPANY_CD AND VALID_IND = 'Y' AND CBC_GBE_SCOPE = 'Y' AND COMPANY_TYPE_CD IN ('B', 'L');
SELECT COUNTRY_CD INTO V_COUNTRY_CD FROM MDM_V_COUNTRIES WHERE COUNTRY_ID = :NEW.COUNTRY_ID;

SELECT COMPANY_CD FROM CFG_V_COMPANIES WHERE LEGAL_COMPANY_CD = :NEW.COMPANY_CD AND VALID_IND = 'Y' AND CBC_GBE_SCOPE = 'Y' AND COMPANY_TYPE_CD IN ('O', 'V') ) LOOP MDM_UTIL_COMPANIES.MODIFYCOMPANYMAPPING_CE_JU ( I_COMPANY_CD => V_REC.COMPANY_CD, I_REPORTING_ENTITY_CD => 'J-' || V_COUNTRY_CD, I_VALID_FROM_DATE => V_VALID_FROM, I_VALID_TO_DATE => NULL, I_CHANGE_USER => V_USERID, I_MAPPING_TYPE => 'JU', I_ACTION_TYPE => 'INSERT' );

begin_end_statements.cursor_query: (SELECT COMPANY_CD FROM CFG_V_COMPANIES WHERE LEGAL_COMPANY_CD = :NEW.COMPANY_CD AND VALID_IND = 'Y' AND CBC_GBE_SCOPE = 'Y' AND COMPANY_TYPE_CD IN ('O', 'V') )

parameter.handler_string: 'The address cannot be updated because the Address type is different. Old address type: ' || :OLD.ADDRESS_TYPE_CD || ' New address type: ' || :NEW.ADDRESS_TYPE_CD
An address already exists for this Company and Address type. To modify the existing address, please use the Update button.
The company country modified but not the Valid From Date. Please update also the Valid From Date.
The legal address cannot be inserted for this type of company
It is not allowed to invalidate/delete this type of address
